description.title: Description
description.lead: ABC-Land is an adventure and education game where the Hero must save the world of words after all the letters were stolen. As you explore fairy-tale locations, you help the Hero recover letters, repair items, and rebuild meaning — learning the alphabet along the way. This is new education during fabulous world gameplay.
